data.title: 5382, Union City, CA — Public Records Instantly
data.meta_description: Puja Sharma is a resident of CA. Lookup the home address and phone 5104155382 and other contact details for this person
data.text:
Alter Names

The same person can appear under different names in public records. Quite often, people use short versions of their name (i.e. Wendy, vs. Gwendolyn), sometimes they use their name’s international variations (Walter/Gutierre). It is quite rare but still happens that a person can be found being listed under a completely different name.

Alter Name *Full NamePersons Count ?Share ? PP Sharma 2421.43% PoojaPooja Sharma 7020.41% SinghSingh Sharma14.08% JitendraJitendra Sharma262.04% JitendrJitendr Sharma12.04% PuneetPuneet Sharma392.04% JayJay Sharma212.04%

* Other possible variations for this name: Verma, Puga, Jain, Gijitendra, Jipendra, Jetendra, Jitedra, Champak, Bumia, Tuja, Shah, Puza, Buju, Js, Dj, Champakbhai.

Last Name Possible Variations

Foreign surnames can be transliterated and even translated (e.g. Rivers vs. Ríos). Sometimes names in public records are misspelled due to silly typos and OCR errors. For example, Westby could be listed as Weftby. Make sure to check as many variants as possible.

Alter Last NameFull NamePersons Count ?Share ? KumarPuja Kumar 99.19% SinghPuja Singh 223.5% PrasadPuja Prasad11.39% PatelPuja Patel1681.26% ShahPuja Shah201.26%

This surname is found in public records in various versions, some of which are Sherma, Sharman, Sharna, Harma, Shama, Sharme, Charma, Sharama, Smarma, Ksharma, Sharm, Harman, Shrma, Fharma, Sarma, Sherman, Kumarsharma, Sharam, Sherme, Ramirez

Check Facebook

Puja Sharma can be found on facebook https://www.facebook.com/search/top/?q=Puja+Sharma&epa=SEARCH_BOX. If this link does not work for you, you can also use FB directory https://www.facebook.com/directory/people/. Note, Facebook may ask you to prove you're not a bot - just solve CAPTCHA.
